title: Visual RPG Studio 1.2.4 (Game Engine and Editor)
description:
Description: LastEnd Visual RPG Studio gives you the power to create your own original games without any special knowledge or training. All you need is a computer an a imagination, and your on the way to making your own game. VRS allow for almost endless maps that can contain up to 10,000,000 tiles.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------


Main Features:
@ Larger Maps - Supports up tp 10,000,000 tiles.
@ 10 Layers - Add or remove layers as you need them.
@ Unlimmited Tilesets
@ Unlimmited Animated Tiles
@ Collision Per Layer
@ Any Grid Size
@ Built-in visual Lua IDE
@ Unlimmited animations
@ Open Template market.
@ Lua Scripting


--------------------------------------------------------------------------


Version 1.2.4

For Operating Systems  Vista, Windows 7, Window 8
